title: The Rebellion
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This pizzeria and burger eatery has vegan pizza, MorningStar chicken, Boca burger, Tofurky italian sausage, LightLife pepperoni and sausage, Follow Your Heart mozzarella, Galaxy vegan American and pepperjack cheese, vegan hot wings, and other vegan-friendly foods. In the parking lot is a sign that reads, "vegan parking."
